subject: English
atomic_concept: We use our hands to clap.

nested_learning.intuition: Hands help us clap and hold things.

misconception_fit: We do not clap with our legs.
Hands are not used to smell.
socratic_prompts: Which body part do you use to clap?
Can you clap without using your hands?

difficulty_modes.medium: We use our hands to clap.
difficulty_modes.hard: Hands help us clap and hold things.
difficulty_modes.master: Hands are body parts used for clapping and holding objects.
